entry.title: 使用hexo插件换主题以及装饰
entry.content:
页面添加2D人物

npm install –save hexo-helper-live2d

_config.yml添加配置

#Live2D
##https://github.com/xiazeyu/live2d-widget.js
##https://l2dwidget.js.org/docs/class/src/index.js~L2Dwidget.html#instance-method-init
live2d:
model:
scale: 1
hHeadPos: 0.5
vHeadPos: 0.618
display:
superSample: 2
width: 150
height: 300
position: right
hOffset: 0
vOffset: -20
mobile:
show: true
scale: 0.5
react:
opacityDefault: 0.7
opacityOnHover: 0.2
